artist: Artist: Pablo Picasso; Author: Prosper Mérimée; Publisher: La Bibliotèque Française; Printer: Atelier Lacourière et Frélaut, Paris, France (engravings, aquatints); Printer: Imprimerie Union, Paris , (text and type)
description: 38 engravings; contained in an Arches wove wrapper inside a cardboard folder with lettering on the front; slip case: papier peigne and cloth-covered protective boards with lettering on the spine
image_copyright: © Estate of Pablo Picasso %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
medium: Engravings with burin, lift ground aquatints, and letterpress
provenance: (Martin Sumers Graphics, New York); sold to MIA, 1984.
title: Carmen
